title: 절대마녀 1 [Absolute Witch 1]
description: Skyla is a young witch in a world where witches no longer exist. On her way to meet her husband she is picked up by an easily bored old woman and her servant, and a mysterious alchemist. What adventures will Skyla face on her way to Wells?Source : Mangaupdates
author: Tae-Yeon Kim
